My Work

Check out some of my projects

Head-up Display for cars


Description


A car head-up display that helps driver s to navigate more easily and conveniently. Its features are:

Camera + ultrasonic sensor

Helps driver to see the blind spot of a car. The camera visualises the rear of the car, while the ultrasonic sensor gives an accurate distance between the car and objects behind.

Navigation

Navigation system sourced from Open Street Map by Skobbler.

Temperature control

Informs user of the precise internal temperature to help them control it more accurately.


Platform: Android

Tools: Android Studio, Java Language

Kamar Pelajar


Description


Designed the web interface of kamarpelajar.com using bootstrap and Vue.js. Using laravel as the web application framework for the backend. Kamar Pelajar is an online marketplace for student to rent their home.


Platform: Website

Tools: Javascript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap

Chemistry Learning App


Description


This app assists junior high students in learning basic chemistry. It consists of:

Periodic Table

Users can view the entire periodic table and get detailed explanation of each element when they press one. They can also sort the table by type.

Memorising Technique

This feature helps users memorize the table via a drag-and-drop game.

Chemistry Formulae

This feature lists basic chemistry formulae and a brief explanation of each upon pressing each one.


Platform: Android

Tools: Android Studio, Java Language

English Learning App


Description


This app assists elementary students in learning English. Its features are:

Listening

Users learn new vocabulary by listening to a word and looking at its associated image, accompanied by an Indonesian translation.

Video

Users can learn English from Youtube videos sourced via Youtube API.

Quiz

Users have the option to test their knowledge with a graded 20-question quiz.


Platform: Android

Tools: Android Studio, Java Language

News Website


Description


A website about news article, consisting of three main pages:

Main Page

contains the main news, and other news article in the form of grid. if one of the article is clicked, it will go to another page

Article Page

A page where news reader read the page, on the right side, the reader can pick which category of another article they would like to read

About Page

A brief page about the organization and a button where reader can join the newsletter


Platform: Website

Tools: Javascript, HTML, CSS, NPM, Git

Restaurant Website


Description


Develop the user interface of a restaurant website consisting of three html pages

Main Page

Showing the menu and the current promotion using carousel and cards.

About Us Page

Showing the people behind the company, using card feature. The detail of the person is shown after it has been clicked.

Contact Us Page

Contains a form for the customers to provide their information and a box for the question they want to ask


Platform: Website

Tools: Javascript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, NPM, Git

Hotel Website


Description


A brief website about hotel information consisting of three main pages

Home Page

A page where the user can see the general information about the hotel

Video

A page where the user can see the detailed description about the hotel and also testimonies from previous hotel users

Contact Us

A page where user can contact the hotel manager


Platform: Website

Tools: HTML, CSS

Task List Website


Description


A small website to create task lists, it stores the value in a local storage, so the tasks will remain available even though the website is refreshed, and only will be erased after it is being deleted.


Platform: Website

Tools: Javascript, HTML, CSS Materialize

Number Guesser


Description


Mini game website where user can predict a random number for three times opportunity, if the user can predict it correctly, they will win, otherwise, they lose


Platform: Website

Tools: Javascript, HTML, CSS Skeleton
